price_error_desc: Could not retrieve the current TON price data. Please try again later.
copy_failed_desc: Enter an amount to calculate the result.
profit_warning_desc: The percentage profit value seems high. Please ensure this is correct.
placeholder_help_text: Click a placeholder below to copy it. Use them in the text areas above to build your format.
placeholder_copied_desc: {placeholder} has been copied to your clipboard.
ai_desc: Describe the reply format you want, and let the AI create it for you.
ai_placeholder: Example: I want a format that shows the amount of TON sold and the total IDR received.
ai_error_empty_desc: Please describe the format you want.
placeholder_input_amount_str: The amount entered by the user.
placeholder_laba_str: The profit value (percentage or fixed amount).
placeholder_total_laba_str: The total profit from the transaction.
placeholder_harga_jual_per_ton_str: The selling price per TON (rate + profit).
placeholder_harga_beli_per_ton_str: The buying price per TON (rate - profit).
placeholder_harga_jual_str: Final selling price based on input.
placeholder_harga_beli_str: Final buying price based on input.
rate_card_desc: Here is your shareable rate card. You can download it as an image or copy the text.
rate_card_download_error_desc: Could not generate the image. Please try again.
changelog_desc: See the latest updates and improvements to the app.
api_docs_desc: You can use our public API to fetch the latest rates programmatically.
api_docs_endpoint_desc: Returns JSON data for sell (IDR to TON) and buy (TON to IDR) rates.
rate_card_image_api_desc: For programmatic access, such as for bots, you can use the dedicated Rate Card page. Your bot can take a screenshot of this page to generate an image.
rate_card_image_api_endpoint_desc: Returns an HTML page containing only the Rate Card, perfect for capturing.
notes_header_desc: A quick access notepad. Tap a note to copy its content.
notes_empty_error_desc: Both title and content are required.
notes_empty_state_desc: Add and manage your notes here.
notes_empty_state_desc_ios: You can create notes by tapping the edit button in the top right corner.
about_desc: KIOS DAZAI is a fast and modern currency conversion tool, equipped with productivity features to streamline your daily workflow.
help_desc_p1: Converter: Double-tap the input field to reset. Tap a result card to copy the detailed format.
help_desc_p2: Quick Notes: Tap any note to edit. To add new notes, tap the edit icon in the header.
help_desc_p3: Rate Card & API: Generate a shareable rate card image or access rates programmatically via the Public API page.
order_method_desc: Copy the order form, then tap 'Chat with Bot' to send it.
order_form_general:
Hello, I would like to order:
- Service: {serviceName}
- 
- 

Please provide more information. Thank you!
